about: Hello! My name is Amin Norollah, and I enjoy creating things that live on the internet. My interest in web development started back in 2012 during my bachelor's degree when I worked in a small company and had a task to edit Joomla and WordPress websites with CSS and HTML. As I worked with the bigger teams and collaborated on more complex projects, I learned more things and achieved more experiences.

I learned to be staying focused on achieving high-quality results under strict deadlines, I had this opportunity to learn and work with many languages and frameworks and understand how to utilize high-end tools in my projects.
academic: I graduated with an MSc degree in computer engineering from Iran University of Science and Technology (IUST) with a GPA of 4.0 (first ranked), and then I worked as a researcher at IUST. I had the chance to collaborate on several scientific projects, which have opened my eyes to a broad range of research in computer engineering, and helped me to participate in industrial projects as well.
professional: I spent about $2012$ years as a software engineer and have $2018$+ years of experience in designing and developing server applications, APIs, user interfaces, testing, debugging, and training staff. Proficient in an assortment of technologies, including .Net, C#, JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, SQL , and No-SQL databases. Proven ability in optimizing web functionalities that improve data retrieval and workflow efficiencies.
